Package org.kiji.examples.phonebook

Kiji phonebook example.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddEntry Interactively create a phonebook entry and add it to the Kiji table.
Address  
Address.Builder RecordBuilder for Address instances.
AddressFieldExtractor Deprecated. using "Raw" MapReduce over Kiji tables is no longer the preferred mechanism for iterating over rows of a Kiji table.
AddressFieldExtractor.AddressMapper Map task that will take the Avro address field and place all the address fields into individual fields in the derived column family.
DeleteEntriesByState Deprecated. using "Raw" MapReduce is no longer the preferred mechanism to iterate over rows of a Kiji table.
DeleteEntriesByState.DeleteEntriesByStateMapper A Mapper that will be run over the rows of the phonebook table, deleting the entries with an address from the US state specified in the "delete.state" job configuration variable.
DeleteEntry Deletes a phonebook entry interactively.
Fields Constants that define column families and qualifiers used in this application.
IncrementTalkTime Deprecated. using "Raw" MapReduce jobs that interact with Kiji tables is no longer the preferred mechanism.
IncrementTalkTime.IncrementTalkTimeMapper Map task that will parse phone call logs from a text file and insert the records into the phonebook table, while keeping track of the total amount of talk-time per contact.
Lookup Lookup a phonebook entry by user id and return the information.
PhonebookImporter Shell for the PhonebookImportMapper class.
PhonebookImporter.PhonebookBulkImporter Map task that will parse user records from a text file and insert the records into the phonebook table.
StandalonePhonebookImporter A local program that will parse user records from a text file and insert the records into the phonebook table.
 

Enum Summary
AddressFieldExtractor.AddressMapper.Counter Job counters.
DeleteEntriesByState.DeleteEntriesByStateMapper.Counter Job counters.
 

Package org.kiji.examples.phonebook Description

Kiji phonebook example. See README.txt for usage instructions.
